news.title: Bitcoin sinks to $115,000 after hitting its newest record, as macro concerns spark liquidation wave
news.summary: The crypto market tumbled to begin the week as heightened macro concerns triggered more than $500 million in long liquidations. The market is now trading around $3,000 per coin.

news.title: When 'invest like the 1%' fails: How Yieldstreet's real estate bets left customers with massive losses
news.summary: Yieldstreet customers say they face huge losses on real estate investments. Yieldstreet is a private markets startup that invests in real estate.

news.title: Three things Europe wants as leaders prepare to meet Trump
news.summary: Seven EU leaders are traveling to the U.S. on Monday looking to bring Washington on the side of Ukraine. They will meet with President Barack Obama and other world leaders.

news.title: Versant to rename MSNBC, drop famed peacock logos in Comcast separation
news.summary: Versant is set to split from Comcast's NBCUniversal. Versant will become a separate company under a new name. The new name, Versant, is expected to be announced later this year.

news.title: Novo Nordisk offers diabetes drug Ozempic for less than half the price for cash-paying U.S. patients
news.summary: Patients can pay $499 in cash per month for three dose sizes of Ozempic through the company's direct-to-consumer pharmacy and GoodRx, among other platforms.

news.title: Advisers are too quick to sell winners. One firm found a solution.
news.summary: A brokerage discussed a novel solution to what’s known as the disposition effect. The effect is selling winners too early and losers too late.

news.title: Cruise-ship water slides are coming under scrutiny after Royal Caribbean incident
news.summary: The slides are an increasingly popular attraction on many of the mega vessels operated by cruise lines. The slides are available on all major cruise lines, from Royal Caribbean to Costa Rica.

news.title: How social media convinces investors they’re the next Warren Buffett — or smarter
news.summary: Internet investing sites and tips give people a false — and costly — sense of their abilities, studies show. Legendary investor Howard Marks has a solution.

news.title: How one strategist solves the great market paradox playing out right now
news.summary: The market is not oblivious to risks right now. It’s well aware of them but maintaining equilibrium in the process. The market is well aware that it is in danger of overreacting.

news.title: Without this Jackson Hole signal, stocks could slide 15% in the fall, says one strategist
news.summary: Fed Chair Powell’s speech may disappoint investors, according to Evercore”s Emanuel. Emanuel: “I don’t think we’ve seen the peak of the Fed.”
